Routing¶

Summary¶

Resource Operation Description
API GET /api/v1/(string:category) Get a JSON with all the items under category provided
  GET /api/v1/categories Get a JSON with all categories
Category GET /catalog/(string:category) List all the items
  GET /catalog/(string:category)/delete Delete the given category
  POST /catalog/(string:category)/delete  
  GET /catalog/(string:category)/edit Edit the given category
  POST /catalog/(string:category)/edit  
  GET /catalog/new Create a new category
  POST /catalog/new  
Home GET /catalog List all the categories
  GET /  
Item GET /catalog/(string:category)/(string:item) List the item info
  GET /catalog/(string:category)/(string:item)/delete Delete the given item
  POST /catalog/(string:category)/(string:item)/delete  
  GET /catalog/(string:category)/(string:item)/edit Edit the given item
  POST /catalog/(string:category)/(string:item)/edit  
  GET /catalog/(string:category)/new Create a new item
  POST /catalog/(string:category)/new  
User GET /authorize Create a flow instance to manage the OAuth2
  GET /gconnect Fetch the Oauth2 tokens and store credentials
  GET /revoke Revoke user access by removing credentials

Route Details¶

GET /api/v1/(string: category)¶

Return a JSON with all the items in the given category

Parameters:
  • category (str) – The selected category
Return:

Retrun a JSON list of items.
GET /api/v1/categories¶

Return a JSON with all the categories

Return:Return a JSON list of categories.
GET /authorize¶

Create a flow instance to manage the OAuth2 Authorization Grant Flow steps

GET /catalog¶

List all the categories and last added items

  • items - Retrieve the 5 last added or updated items
  • categories - Retrieve all the categories
return:Render the catalog template
GET /¶

List all the categories and last added items

  • items - Retrieve the 5 last added or updated items
  • categories - Retrieve all the categories
GET /catalog/(string: category)¶

List all the items in the given category

  • items - Retrieve all the ites in the given category
  • categories - Retrieve all the categories
param category:The selected category
type category:str
return:Render the items template
GET /catalog/(string: category)/(string: item)¶

List the information about the given item

  • items - Retrieve the item at the hand of the name given
param category:The selected category
type category:str
param item:The selected item
type item:str
return:Render the description template
GET /catalog/(string: category)/(string: item)/delete¶

Delete the given item

param category:The selected category
type category:str
param item:The selected item
type item:str
return:Render item_delete template
POST /catalog/(string: category)/(string: item)/delete¶

Delete the given item

param category:The selected category
type category:str
param item:The selected item
type item:str
status 302:and then redirect to GET /catalog/(string:category)
GET /catalog/(string: category)/(string: item)/edit¶

Edit the given item

param category:The selected category
type category:str
param item:The selected item
type item:str
return:Render item_edit template
POST /catalog/(string: category)/(string: item)/edit¶

Edit the given item

param category:The selected category
type category:str
param item:The selected item
type item:str
form name:Item name
form description:
 Item description
form category:Item category
status 302:and then redirect to GET /catalog/(string:category)/(string:item)
GET /catalog/(string: category)/delete¶

Delete the given category

param category:The selected category
type category:str
return:Render the category_delete template
POST /catalog/(string: category)/delete¶

Delete the given category

param category:The selected category
type category:str
status 302:and then redirect to GET /catalog
GET /catalog/(string: category)/edit¶

Edit the given category

  • user - Retrieve the user details from the db with session[‘id’]
  • cat_edit - Retrieve the category to be edited from the db.
param category:The selected category
type category:str
return:Render the category_edit template
POST /catalog/(string: category)/edit¶

Edit the given category

  • user - Retrieve the user details from the db with session[‘id’]
  • cat_edit - Retrieve the category to be edited from the db.
param str category:
 The selected category
type category:str
form name:Category name
status 302:and then redirect to GET /catalog
GET /catalog/(string: category)/new¶

Create a new item

Initially retrieve a list of categories to display in the select options. Identify the user through their google_id.

param category:The selected category
type category:str
return:render template main/item_new
POST /catalog/(string: category)/new¶

Create a new item

Retrieve the category id number by the request.form[‘cat_select’] Retrieve the user id number through the session[‘id’] Create newItem with info form request.form and retrieved cat.id and user.id Redirect to list_items route

param category:The selected category
type category:str
form name:Items name
status 302:and then redirect to GET /catalog/(string:category)
GET /catalog/new¶

Create a new category.

  • user - Retrieve the user details from the db with session[‘id’]
return:Render the category_new template
POST /catalog/new¶

Create a new category.

  • user - Retrieve the user details from the db with session[‘id’]
form name:Category name
status 302:and then redirect to GET /catalog
GET /gconnect¶

Specify the state so it can verify the server response. When successful, fetch the OAuth2 tokens and store the credentials

GET /revoke¶

Revoke access to user by removing credentials token
